parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~610399~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SwitchoverTimeout
parameters.description: The timeout period for the switchover operation. The operation is canceled after it has been performed for a time period that exceeds the value. Unit: seconds. Valid value: 10 to 3600.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the switchover operation. Valid values:

*   switch
*   cancel
*   interrupt
